headline: Ask HN: Best blog URL format for blog posts?
description:
Example 1

myblog.com/my-readeable-but-long-blog-post-title-in the-url

OR

myblog.com/posts/my-readeable-but-long-blog-post-title-in the-url

Example 2

myblog.com/2022/08/my-readeable-but-long-blog-post-title-in the-url

Example 3

myblog.com/62642060

---

Pro and cons

Examples 1 and 2: Readable but long URLs. They may also help SEO (search engine optimisation).

Example 2: The date in the URL provide helpful context.

Example 3: A short URL easily shared (but not descriptive).

Which of these URL formats do you prefer? Or do you think they don't really matter?

Thank you :-)
